column3: perhaps also move it to the test directory?\n
Well you also slimmed bignum.h down, so let's go with this one.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/7cd0af7cc222d0694ce72e71458aef460698ee2c for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Alternatively, we could replace the scriptnum tests by data-driven ones, and get rid of bignum.h entirely.\n
Having bignum in the tests directory is fine for now. At some point we could move to data-driven tests, but it seems low-priority as long as we need OpenSSL for other things.\n
Because of CADDR_TIME_VERSION. It was indirectly included through bignum.h.\n
